## EthersGivety.withdrawGUSDFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw GUSD from Stability Deposit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withdrawGUSDFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of GUSD to withdraw. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[StabilityDepositChangeDetails](./lib-base.stabilitydepositchangedetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [GVTY reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.gvtyreward.md)<!-- -->.
